name: Cavy Quest
description:
This is a game I made for a school assignment that I decided to base on my childhood pet, Chestnut. The object of the game is to perform tasks for Chestnut by investigating your surroundings. Once you're satisfied with what you've done, move to the ending area and you'll see how many of the available tasks you completed.

Word of advice that guinea pigs are social animals, and that if you're planning on getting a guinea pig, you should get more than one. Having only one guinea pig at a time like the player character of the game isn't recommended in real life.
